properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: A secret key for signing and verifying JWT tokens (min. 256 bits i.e. 32 characters)

properties.name: jwt.token-validity
properties.description: Validity period for generated JWT tokens

properties.name: jwt.secret-2fa
properties.description: A secret key for signing and verifying JWT 2FA tokens (min. 256 bits i.e. 32 characters)

properties.name: jwt.refresh-token-validity
properties.description: How long after JWT expiration you are able to renew the token

properties.name: jwt.verify-url
properties.description: URL of an end point where username and 2FA code is sent

properties.name: jwt.refresh-url
properties.description: URL of an end point where a user can acquire new JWT after token expiration
